# joy-backdrop



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute | Description                                        | Type                                                   | Default     |
| --------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `origin` _(required)_ | `origin`  | The backdrop can be created from many components * | `"dialog" \| "dropdown" \| "product-tour" \| "select"` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description | Type                                                                |
| --------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `backdropClick` |             | `CustomEvent<"dialog" \| "dropdown" \| "product-tour" \| "select">` |
